about_the_game:
Maiden Gear : Dynamic Visual Novel crossed with Strategic Roguelike Shooter! Currently in development, our beautiful and deadly Robot Maids are good at making you the perfect breakfast tea and ending lives before they know it.

We're posting development progress and concept art over at our Twitter account, follow for more updates!

Key Features

  • Bullet Hell & Roguelike Shooter! Inspired by genre leaders, shoot and loot your way against rogue robots and stalwart enforcers. You may assimilate their weaponry - but it seems that everytime you do that, your Robot Maid takes on the mannerisms and even the personality of her former foe...
  • Lavish Live2D animation for the main character! Dynamically expressing the subtle and gradual changes in her personality. Which leads us into --
  • Bringing the roguelike experience to visual novels! Your Robot Maid will be different each playthrough, and your choices are what makes her truly yours.
  • Dynamic and changing visual novel! We wish to combine the Visual Novel and Roguelike Shooter into a singular intwined experience. You need to absorb the strength of your enemies continue fighting, but firepower comes with hidden costs. That fancy new 4-way laser solves a lot of problems, but do you really want the AI of a murderous rampaging maid uploaded to your lifelong companion?

Intro

All things can be remade:
Memories, emotions, my favorite type of tea, what makes me, myself.
Consciousness and personality just strands of code, copied and pasted the way children might play with stickers.

Flowers for the love of my life - one year it has been, since she drew her last breath.
Yet she is also standing right here, beside me.
Her voice, her touch, the way she smiles, perfectly recreated, no difference.

If all things can be remade...
"Good morning, master."
...What truly makes you, you?

content_descriptors.notes: Scenes and artwork in the game may contain partial nudity and suggestive themes. Content may be unsuitable for minors.
